ABOUT.TITLE_ONE: We are more than an application
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_ONE:
Misiil is currently the most innovative technological solution for the international logistics industry. How do we do it? We are an expert group of workers searching every day for solutions for an operation more efficient. With our software, the productivity level of your company will increase and you will have more and better tools to enhance your customers' experience.

Our commitment is to reduce as much as possible the times and movements in all the points of its operation. This is only possible with the technological leverage that we provide and the facilities to connect and integrate with different actors throughout the international logistics process.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_TWO:
The experience and comprehensive work of our team for more than 5 years and with more than 1,400 agencies around the world, allows us to have the confidence to assure you that with Misiil it will improve the experience you provide to your customers and the development of your logistics operation.

Â¡Let's take off on this adventure!

FEATURES.TITLE_TWO: the best option at your fingertips
FEATURES.PARAGRAPH_ONE: Automate all processes through the different features that Misiil offers. Reduce times on daily processes, create flows to optimize tasks, eliminate redundancies and streamline your processes in general.

PRICES.TITLE_TWO: Four plans, at the best price and with dedicated support
PRICES.TITLE_THREE: The best option within your reach
PRICES.PARAGRAPH_ONE: Know in detail what modules our plans include. Also, you will be able to review the different annotations that are included in each module.
PRICES.TABLE_TITLE_FOUR: 24/7 support (via tickets). Personalized attention during Miami GMT-5 hours from Monday to Friday.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_ONE: Initial Setup: A single payment will be made that includes; initial printer configuration, label configuration, server configuration, SSL security certificates, database creation and import.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_TWO: Transactions: Creation for courier waybills, warehouse receipts (WHR), air waybills (AWB, MAWB) and sea waybills are unlimited.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_THREE: Reports: For the Agency plan, only one report is included.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_FOUR: Accounting: For the Agency plan it is included; report of commissions, COD payments and movement of COD payments.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_SIX: Customizations: For the Agency plan you can customize the different email formats.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_SEVEN: Customizations: For the Casillero Plus, Standard and Corporate plans you can customize the different email formats and forms.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_EIGHT: IFRAMES: For the Agency plan, a link and script will be included for tracking guides.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_NINE: IFRAMES: For the Casillero Plus, Standard and Corporative plans, 3 links and a script will be included for the tracking of guides, User Login and creation of the mailbox.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_TEN: APP: For the Casillero Plus plan, a single payment of 150 usd will be made. The maintenance of the application is included in the monthly payment.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_ELEVEN: APP: For the Standard and Corporate plans, a single payment of 150 usd will be made. The maintenance of the application is included in the monthly payment. In addition, the APP for the company is free. Yes, an extra APP is required, the cost will be 150usd for each additional agency.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_TWELVE: Lockers: The lockers module will only be available for the company.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_THIRTEEN: Integrations: Between missile systems have no cost.
PRICES.NOTES_PARAGRAPH_FOURTEEN: Integrations: With third-party systems such as: Servientrega, Coordinadora, Alegra, Quickbooks, Authorize, etc. or some other platform will have an additional cost.
